pr_title: [1.16] Re-introduce "outdated" notification on Mods button in main menu

timeline.message: re-introduce "outdated" notification on Mods button in main menu

timeline.bodyText: What's the reason behind chaning the default from VersionChecker.Status.UP_TO_DATE to null
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText:
Because UP_TO_DATE is not necessarily right. If some mods are AHEAD or BETA then we certainly aren't up to date.
The reason for choosing null here is that that's what previous versions did.
replies.author: diesieben07
